title: Lag Ingame after Patch 7.19?
body: Anyone having the same issue?  My Ms is ok, like 50-60 and fps is also fine i think but i have these lag spikes! where my champ just turns up some Seconds after i clicked the move button, same whit spells etc.. dunno what is wrong!?

replies.body:
Same problem here. I have steady 110 fps and 30 ms yet I experience huge in game lag spikes, feels like my "real ping" goes from 30 to 1.5k back to 150 then up again. Clearly unplayble, just lost my first ranked of the day cause of that :/
Relaunching game didnt change anything, and nobody seemed to have the same problem in my game, I'm gonna try and see if it's the same with my smurf.
It's obviously not from my end but from league server's one as even when i watched far away fights the had lagspikes (usuaklly when i have high ping playing somewhere else I have trouble fighting myself but if i watch a far away teamfight it'll be smooth, however there it isn't at all).
yes same issues mass amount of lag spikes since patch 7.19, unplayable, get frozen, dcded, of stuck in game looking at the ground just unplayable at all 70ms ping 133fps just horrible
Exact same problem on Mac client/game. Except seemingly worse.
OK THIS IS SERIOUS I JUST HAD A GAME RIGHT AND BASICALLY I WAS PLAYING AND EVERYONE ELSE WAS LAGGING LIKE MAD WE HAD NORMAL PINGS BUT EVERYONE IN CHAT SAID THEY ARE LAGGING SO YEH HELP US OUT RITO TY

Yep same here. I am on pc. Ping is constant near 140 and some time animation lags some time i don't see the abilities of enemy champ. My ping used be near 95 ms and now its hard to hit even basic attacks because of animation lags. This new update is bad for the ping and packet data issues. Hope will be solve soon.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Same here! Since downloading the patch the lag is so bad i can't play. The MS will fluctuate from 35 to 2000 and im constantly being disconnected. Restarting hasnt helped. Its a bummer because its unplayable this way (I play on pc)

My internet connection is fine and stable so I dont think the problem is on my end
Yea for the past several games (I play on Mac), only for this patch my avg ping of 43, has hit 6 and 7 thousand constantly. This is making the game un-playable.

Same here, I never actually dealt with any packet loss before. But I have heard of this situation before. It sucks now that im actually dealing with it. Can you please help? I don't know how to obtain any network logs and it's quite frustrating to gain elo!!!

Those weird lag spikes without seeing a change in FPS or Ping is a good sign that you're actually dealing with packet loss. Essentially, packet loss means that parts of the data in your connection are getting damaged or lost entirely before it reaches out servers. 

Grab the network logs from one of those laggy games and let our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Take a screenshot of what it says afterward and post it here so that I can go over it with you ^_^!
Mine's with ping though... my fps stays constant at 40-46 like always though.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EN0AdBJ9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-28T22:17:21.518+0000)
>
> Those weird lag spikes without seeing a change in FPS or Ping is a good sign that you're actually dealing with packet loss. Essentially, packet loss means that parts of the data in your connection are getting damaged or lost entirely before it reaches out servers. 
> 
> Grab the network logs from one of those laggy games and let our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Take a screenshot of what it says afterward and post it here so that I can go over it with you ^_^!

NETWORK DIAGNOSTIC OVERALL RATING: MAJOR ISSUES
PING OVER TIME

Your average ping was 70 milliseconds.

The worst ping you experienced was 164ms. This means you experienced high ping during this game, which is likely where you were seeing issues. See below for a few recommendations to help out with this.

PACKET LOSS OVER TIME
 
Your average percentage of packet loss for this game was 0.93%.

Overall, this means you had a high amount of packets lost during the game. This can be caused by various network issues, so please see below for a few common steps that can help reduce packet loss.

Don't know how to share the screenshot on here, but this is what the log reader said for me. also i haven't seen anything to bad before but after updating to patch 7.19 every other game during team fights i will randomly loos control of my character and will get disconnected for 30 seconds to 1 minute before the game reconnects me. this happens 2-3 times per game. also i avg a 68-89 ping and a FPS of 90-120 (i have the settings set to high with FPS capped at 120) over the coarse of my games before patch 7.19. after the patch my FPS is still the same and ping is still the same but still get randomly disconnected after i'm reconnected it shows a ping of around 150.

I did what the Log reader said but I'm still getting the lag, and it's not only in the game. It's happening in the client as well, when logging in, creating a lobby, during champ select. It's all started since 7.19

In that reply above, I asked the player to have their logs scanned and post them here so I can look over them. "Doing what the log reader said" doesn't actually *do* anything, it's an act of gathering info so that I can get a better idea of how to fix it. 

If you need help with this as well, go back over my message and provide the screenshots so that I can see what's going on. Just looking at the log reader won't do anything.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EN0AdBJ9,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-09-28T22:17:21.518+0000)
>
> Those weird lag spikes without seeing a change in FPS or Ping is a good sign that you're actually dealing with packet loss. Essentially, packet loss means that parts of the data in your connection are getting damaged or lost entirely before it reaches out servers. 
> 
> Grab the network logs from one of those laggy games and let our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan it. Take a screenshot of what it says afterward and post it here so that I can go over it with you ^_^!

I did what the Log reader said but I'm still getting the lag, and it's not only in the game. It's happening in the client as well, when logging in, creating a lobby, during champ select. It's all started since 7.19

I'm having the same problem... Ever since 7.19 my League has been basically unplayable. I've always had around 35 ping and since I updated it's a consistent 400-800. I'm gonna be ticked if I lose World's missions because I can't play right now.

You can do many token missions against ai as those are considered matchmade. These lag spikes are terribad. I'm on a mac. Time to play something else for while. Maybe they will fix this. Maybe they won't.
same, for whole month
I am seeing same issue
Hi - I am also having a lot of issues with ping spikes/packet loss after the patch 7.19. What should I do to get some help with this?

ive experienced all this random ping and frame skips while playing and just figured rito is trying things after the worlds patch so just went with it, but this moment ago im playing a game and in the end of a teamfight i get slain and my game freezes right theres and after 5 minutes i just had to restart my pc, the game wouldnt minimize or close or anything i just had to force shutdown
SOME ANSWER!!!!!!??????

My ping is usually around 80-90 but in my all recent games it would always go up to 600-800 and after a couple of minutes it will be normal again, no one is connected to my wifi + im using an ethernet cable and I always disable antivirus, steam and any apps that may auto update and cause me to lag in game
